translation: These bodies of the embodied Self, which are eternal, indestructible, and immeasurable, are said to have an end. Therefore, fight, O Arjuna.
commentary: 2.18 Antavantah having an end? Ime these? Bodies: bodies? of the eternal of the everlasting? said are said? embodied of the embodied? Anashinah of the indestructible? of the immeasurable of the immeasurable? Therefore therefore? Fight fight? Bharata O Bharata.Commentary -- Lord Krishna explains to Arjuna the nature of the allpervading? immortal Self in a variety of ways and thus induces him to fight by removing his delusion? grief and despondency which are born of ignorance.
